title: Daly City, California
summary: Daly City (/ˈdeɪli/) is the most populous city in San Mateo County, California, United States, with an estimated 2019 population of 106,280.[11] Located in the San Francisco Bay Area, and immediately south of San Francisco (sharing its northern border with almost all of San Francisco's southern border), it is named for businessman and landowner John Donald Daly.
